content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position(-11.5, 18.5)
- Boiler at position(-11.5, 25.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5)
- PipeGroup connecting the boiler and offshore pump

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(0, 0) and a furnace at position(0, 0)

### Iron plate factory at position(5, 5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position(5, 5)

### Lab at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position(0, 0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items from inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace or crafting machine. In the recent log, the agent attempted to insert iron ore into the second furnace but had no iron ore in inventory.

### Errors when crafting items
- Verify that all required ingredients are available in your inventory or in connected machines before attempting to craft items. The agent encountered an error when trying to craft pipes due to insufficient iron plates.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
